example.eg: Edward received a substantial number of job offers this week; he hasn't decided which one he will take yet.
example.egtrans: 这周，爱德华收到了数目可观的职位邀请。不过他还没有作出最终决定。

example.eg: The company is undergoing a period of substantial reforms.
example.egtrans: 这家公司正处在一段重大的改革时期。

example.eg: There has been a substantial shift in people's attitudes over the last few decades.
The group of hikers ate a substantial breakfast before setting out for the day.
Trevor found his way was barred by a substantial door; there was no way he would be able to break it down.
There is substantial evidence against the suspect.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 确凿的, 确实的, 真实的
